name: Piruja
description:
Suddenly one day the world lost its color and became nothing. Help Piruja the Color Witch paint the world.

IMPORTANT THIS IS A GAME FOR MEGADRIVE

You will need an emulator to play it.

Here is the emulator used to develop the game

https://segaretro.org/Gens_KMod

If you are going to play in this emulator, use wasd to move player, and enter to reset level.
